title: Shooting rampage in Bristol, Tenn., leaves 1 person dead, 4 injured
content:
BRISTOL, Tenn. — A bullet-riddled hotel office window and a parking lot littered spent shell casings — identified by numbered yellow evidence cards — offered silent testimony Thursday morning to an overnight shooting rampage that left a woman dead and four other people injured.
Yellow crime scene tape encircled the parking lot of the Days Inn at 536 Volunteer Parkway and the adjacent O’Reilly Auto Parts store — ground zero for a deadly spree that left the community rattled and searching for answers.
